tool.name: NGram Annotator
tool.description: Genererates NGrams from sequences of Tokens.
tool.help:
HELP ====
Generates n-grams of the selected length. Only unigrams, bigrams, and trigrams are supported at this time. The generated n-grams are placed into a new view in the container.
Required Annotations --------------------
* http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Token
Generated Annotations ---------------------
The services produces one of:
* http://deiis.lti.cs.cmu.edu/Unigram * http://deiis.lti.cs.cmu.edu/Bigram * http://deiis.lti.cs.cmu.edu/Trigram
